meanings.definition: A pair of small speakers worn over or in the ears to listen to audio from a device.
meanings.sent1: I always use my earphones when I want to listen to music without bothering anyone.
meanings.sent2: She plugged her earphones into her phone to enjoy her favorite songs.
meanings.sent3: The cat mistook my earphones for a toy and started playing with them.
meanings.sent4: His earphones were like a portal to a world of music and sound.
meanings.sent5: The bright red earphones stood out against her dark hair.

meanings.definition: A device used to listen to audio privately without disturbing others.
meanings.sent1: During the flight, I put on my earphones to watch a movie without bothering my seatmate.
meanings.sent2: He always carries his earphones in his bag so he can listen to podcasts on the go.
meanings.sent3: The earphones saved the day when she needed to drown out the noisy construction outside.
meanings.sent4: Her earphones were her silent companions in a world of loud distractions.
meanings.sent5: The wireless earphones provided a seamless listening experience.
